metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33595 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: CPython v3.12.0 alpha 7 was discovered to contain a heap use-after-free viathe function ascii_decode at /Objects/unicodeobject.c.

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
